skills.name: React
skills.description: I have a basic knowledge of the framework. Understand the framework principles and can implement solutions defined at the documentation or tutorials

levels.description: I have a basic knowledge of the framework. Understand the framework principles and can implement solutions defined at the documentation or tutorials
I can modify effectively already working solutions to include new features
I can analyse working solutions and propose refactors and generalization
I can define complex architectures and I can provide optimised solutions

I modify effectively already working solutions to include new features

skills.name: Redux
skills.description: I have a basic knowledge of the library. I understand when use redux state and when use the component state.

levels.description: I have a basic knowledge of the library. I understand when use redux state and when use the component state.
I can separate concepts and I have a proper usage of actions and reducers
I am able to keep a normalised state, using complex reducers in order to guarantee immutability and flatten/efficient structures
I can use the library in combination of others to build complex solutions.

skills.name: Redux-Sagas
skills.description: I can add new sagas into a working project

levels.description: I can add new sagas into a working project
I can configure from the scratch a new project
I can write both sync and async sagas processes
I can use Sagas to manage the state of all the components such ui (modals/toast) navigation (navigate between screens) and app state
